name: liquivid Icon Effects
detailed_description:
Icon Effects allows you to recolor and animate icons and logos, even when stored in raster formats like JPG or PNG. It analyzes images to detect the used color palette and is smart enough to give you proper faded transparency (e.g. along edges) when you remove backgrounds.

Key Features

* Recognizes a logo’s or icon’s color palette (even for raster formats like JPG or PNG).
* Each color in the palette can be replaced with another one, including transparency.
In the future it will be possible to replace colors or unicolored areas with gradients.
* Many animation presets (fade in, rotate, etc) allow you to create animated icons, e. g. for transition or mouse-over effects in your software.
* In the future it will be possible to edit multiple icon files using batch processing: This will allow you to quickly adapt all icons or logos on your website or in your app to a new color scheme.

Supported Formats

Input: JPG, PNG, TIFF, PSD, SVG, ICO
Output:
* Non-animated icons: JPG, PNG
* Animated icons: GIF, MP4 (no transparency) and APNG, WebM (with transparency)

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x64 (x86 / 32bit NOT supported!)
  • Graphics: (any)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
